com.example.habitup.Model

Class Attributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.habitup.Model.Attributes

  • public class Attributes
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by sharibarboza on 2017-10-21. Attribute container to hold a user's attributes. The number of attributes and the attribute names will be the same for every user. If attribute names are changed or if more attributes need to be added, just update the static attributeNames list. Implementation uses a hash map, with the attribute name as the key and an integer number (representing the attribute's points) as the value. A hash map is used to allow quick access to any attribute, such as when only one attribute's value needs to be retrieved/updated. Javadoc last updated 2017-11-13 by @gojeffcho.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Attributes(int uid)
      Attributes constructor, which takes the class variable attributeNames and populates an initialized attributeMap with default values of 0.
